sentences: Phalon Anton Alexander, (born April 15, 1974), professionally known as Jazze Pha ( JAZ-ee FAY), is an American record producer, singer, songwriter and rapper from Memphis, Tennessee.
Jazze Pha was born and raised in Memphis, Tennessee.
Jazze Pha was born and raised in Memphis, Tennessee. His father is James Alexander, bassist for the Bar-Kays, an influential group on the Memphis soul scene in the 1960s.
Pha was named after the late Phalon Jones, another member of the Bar-Kays, who died in the December 10, 1967, plane crash that also killed three other Bar-Kays members and Otis Redding.
In 1990, Pha was signed to Elektra Records.
